navbar.logoAlt: CS|WEB Logo - Digital Solutions for Your Business

home.title: Innovative Digital Solutions for Your Business
home.subtitle: CS|Web offers customized, SEO-optimized web solutions that help SMEs attract customers and grow online. You get quality websites tailored to your budget to boost your visibility and business success.

about.who_description: We are a team passionate about technology and innovation, dedicated to helping SMEs build modern and functional websites. We approach each project with great seriousness and a desire to learn and improve constantly. We focus on simple, elegant, and SEO-optimized solutions that help your business grow online and reach a wider audience. Each project is tailored to your specific needs, with a clean and intuitive design at an affordable cost.
about.less_description: We believe that simplicity is key to a successful website. That's why every design created by CS|Web is intuitive, easy to navigate, and performance-optimized, ensuring that visitors have a smooth and enjoyable experience. Every element is designed to highlight the most important aspects of your business, reflecting your brand's personality and values.
about.page_title: About Us - Who We Are and What We Do
about.page_description: We are a technology-driven team helping SMEs grow online with customized SEO solutions and modern design.

services_list.title: Custom Website Development
services_list.description: We transform your business vision into a modern website, tailored to market demands and optimized for the user.

services_list.title: SEO Optimization and Visibility Boost
services_list.description: Want your website to be found quickly on Google? We help you climb the rankings with effective SEO strategies.

services_list.title: Maintenance and Technical Support
services_list.description: We ensure the optimal performance of your website in the long term. We provide regular updates, backups, and quickly solve any issues.

description: Choose the solution that fits your business. Each package includes SEO optimization, attractive design, and features tailored to your needs.

basicPackage.name: Basic Package
basicPackage.description: Perfect for a simple presentation website.
features: ✔ Up to 10 simple pages.
✔ Integrated contact form to interact with visitors.
✔ Basic SEO optimization to reach more users on Google.
✔ 'Back to Top' button for easy navigation on the page.
✔ Ability to add custom text and images to each page.
✔ Translation in the main language of the site (one language only, no advanced multilingual).

ecommercePackage.name: E-commerce Package
ecommercePackage.description: Ideal for small and medium-sized online stores.
features: ✔ Online store with up to 50 products.
✔ Integrated shopping cart functionality to add and purchase products.
✔ Secure online payments (via card or PayPal).
✔ Ability to add product reviews.
✔ Integration with Google Maps for store location (if necessary).
✔ Advanced SEO optimization to attract more visitors from online searches.
✔ Translation in multiple languages to reach an international audience (depending on your choice).
✔ 'Back to Top' button to improve navigation in the store.

customPackage.name: Custom Package
customPackage.description: Customized and innovative solution for your business.
features: ✔ Custom functionalities that meet your business requirements.
✔ API integration to connect the website with external systems (e.g., CRM, ERP, etc.).
✔ Interactive Google Maps for multiple locations (regardless of your business type).
✔ Full translation in multiple languages to reach a global audience.
✔ Ability to implement advanced forms and functionalities (e.g., booking systems, custom price calculators, etc.).
✔ User login and account management functionalities (e.g., for social platforms or online stores).
✔ Customized 'Back to Top' button based on the page design.
✔ Premium SEO optimization to attract customers from all around the world.

testimonial1.quote: Working with the CS|WEB team was excellent! Our site looks fantastic and we've seen a boost in traffic in the first few weeks. I highly recommend them!
testimonial1.name: Mihaela Radu

testimonial2.quote: The CS|WEB team perfectly understood our vision and created a website that reflects exactly what we wanted. We are very happy with the result!
testimonial2.name: Constantin Topală

testimonial3.quote: I had a very good experience with CS|WEB! Our website is fast, modern, and SEO-optimized. We are grateful for their help!
testimonial3.name: Rene Klemig

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
privacyPolicy.section1Content: We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us, such as your name, email address, and other details necessary to provide you with our services.
privacyPolicy.section2Content: We use the collected information to improve our services, communicate with you, and ensure a better experience on our website.
privacyPolicy.section3Content: We take appropriate security measures to protect personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure.
privacyPolicy.section4Content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete the personal information we hold about you. To exercise these rights, please contact us.
privacyPolicy.section5Content: For questions regarding this privacy policy or to exercise your rights, you can contact us at:

termsAndConditions.title: Terms and Conditions
termsAndConditions.intro: Welcome to our website. By accessing or using this site, you agree to the following terms and conditions. If you do not agree with these terms, please do not use our site.
termsAndConditions.section1Content: You agree to use this site only for lawful purposes and to comply with all applicable laws and regulations. You may not use this site to transmit any illegal, defamatory, obscene, or any content that could violate the rights of others.
termsAndConditions.section2Content: All materials on this site, including text, images, graphics, and logos, are protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws. You may not copy, reproduce, or distribute these materials without our prior consent.
termsAndConditions.section3Content: We reserve the right to modify these terms and conditions at any time. We encourage you to check this page periodically to stay informed of any changes.
termsAndConditions.section5Content: For questions related to terms and conditions or to exercise your rights, you can contact us at:

cookieBanner.message: This website uses cookies to enhance user experience.
